dcterms:description: A dataset created by adding varying levels of noise to clean scene images from the LLFF and NeRF datasets, used for training and evaluating burst denoising methods.

dcterms:description: A dataset used for representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis, providing a framework for novel view generation.

dcterms:description: A dataset for learning multi-view image-based rendering, enabling the generation of novel views from a limited number of images.

dcterms:description: A dataset used for training deep learning models for burst denoising, focusing on improving image quality in low-light conditions.

dcterms:description: A dataset that demonstrates high dynamic range view synthesis from noisy raw images, focusing on generating clean views from low-light conditions.
